name: Kitchen Digital Timer, Count Down Up, Rechargeable, Vibration Mode Adjustable Volume and Brightness LED Display, Time Management Cook, Desk, Kids Adults Study Teaching, Kitchen Gadgets
short_description: RGB Digital Display: This kitchen timer's digital display has 6 regular colors and 4 dynamic RGB colors. You can choose different colors for the numbers based on your preference and needs, making it easier to identify and manage time by associating specific colors with specific activities or events.

Extra Large Display: This digital timer features a 5-inch extra large color-changing LED display. Even from across the room, you can easily read the time, reducing the possibility of reading difficulties or misreading. It is an ideal timer for kitchens, homes, gyms, classrooms, schools, and other occasions.

10-Hour Digital Timer: This timer can countdown from 9 hours 59 minutes to zero, or function as a stopwatch counting up from 0 to 9:59:59. With a long duration of 10 hours, it reduces the need for frequent resets, and meets all your timing needs for long cooking sessions, exercise, work, study, and more.

2 Brightness Levels and Power Saving Mode: The cooking timer has two brightness levels - high or low. You can choose the suitable brightness level based on the ambient lighting conditions to avoid discomfort or difficulty in recognizing information on the screen. Furthermore, it has a power-saving mode, where the screen will turn off after 10 seconds once the countdown is set.

3 Volume Levels and Vibration Mode: The timer has three volume levels - high volume (80-90 DB), low volume (60-75 DB), mute and flash. You can choose the appropriate volume mode based on your needs. In addition, it also has a vibration mode, which is perfect for use in meetings, classrooms, or other quiet places.

Rechargeable: No additional batteries required, as it has a built-in battery that supports Type-C charging (charging cable included in the package). The 5" digital display can work for at least 5 hours in high brightness mode. When the battery is low, a low battery indicator will be displayed in the top left corner.

Multiple Uses: Behind the alarm timer, there are four circular magnets, an extendable stand, and a foldable hanging hook, allowing you to hang it up, place it on a table, or stick it to the refrigerator door, and more. You can put it wherever you want.
Note: Use the included charging cable only with an output voltage below 5V. Operating outside this specified range may cause product malfunction and prevent proper operation.

short_description: 【Only Stopwatch Mode】--- MUSHPORT stopwatch only has stopwatch mode, no clock no calendar no countdown, basic operation, easy to use, friendly for children, simple stopwatch for kids and all users.

【Silent Stopwatch】--- No bell No whistle No beep No alarm, mute stopwatch.

【Accurate and Large Display】--- MUSHPORT stopwatch is with high-precision, 1/100th second accuracy; One timing maximum up to 99 hours 59 minutes 59 seconds; Large and clear LCD digit display, easy to read.

【Why does the stopwatch shake with sound?】--- This is normal, in order to maintain the flexibility and service life of the buttons, the buttons are made smaller, which is the shaking sound of the buttons.
【Why does the stopwatch take longer time to turn on than turn off?】--- Because the stopwatch has a self-test process when it is turned on.
